meanings.definition: Having a crest or ridged structure.
meanings.sent1: The cristate mountain stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent2: The cristate feathers of the bird were beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The cristate hat made him look like a royal king.
meanings.sent4: The cristate waves of the ocean crashed against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The cristate design on the building made it unique.

meanings.definition: A plant or animal with a crest or ridge.
meanings.sent1: The colorful bird was a cristate with its bright crest.
meanings.sent2: The dinosaur fossil showed evidence of a cristate on its skull.
meanings.sent3: The cristate on the rooster made it look like it had a crown.
meanings.sent4: The cristate on the lizard's back helped it blend into the environment.
meanings.sent5: The cristate on the flower attracted pollinators.

meanings.definition: To form a crest or ridge.
meanings.sent1: The wind can cristate the sand dunes over time.
meanings.sent2: The artist used clay to cristate the sculpture's intricate details.
meanings.sent3: She tried to cristate a new hairstyle with braids.
meanings.sent4: The river's flow can cristate the rocks into smooth shapes.
meanings.sent5: The chef used a knife to cristate patterns on the cake.
